summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Westview Drive, from west McGraw Street to 11th Avenue West; 10th Avenue West and 9th Avenue West, each form West McGraw Street to West Ray Street; 11th Avenue West, from Gilman Avenue to West Ray Street; West Crockett Street, West McGraw Street, West Wheeler Street, and West Ray Street, each from 11th Avenue West to 9th Avenue West; all in the City of Seattle by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden cross walks, together with the necessar4y drainage and connections to the existing improvements, all in accordance with Resolution No. 1307 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
